body_html: Hi, I am facing something similar, I posted the problem on stackoverflow as well. But no help. I am calling a function with CNN, so if i return from that function, it should delete all the variable and on return create new ones. But it does not. I tried to use answer by mrry that use tf.reset_default_graph(), but even that gives error that no graph found. Can any body guide how to solve this issue.

body: Hi, I am facing something similar, I posted the problem on [stackoverflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47657157/variables-of-tensorflow-generate-error-in-a-loop) as well. But no help. I am calling a function with CNN, so if i return from that function, it should delete all the variable and on return create new ones. But it does not. I tried to use answer by mrry that use tf.reset_default_graph(), but even that gives error that no graph found. Can any body guide how to solve this issue.
